desc: You got sick and your voice is broken, but it had a nice effect on the recording
The mix was messed up and another day is needed to fix the problem
You wanted to add a chipmunk voice in the background, but since it sounded horrible, one day was lost by removing that effect
During the recording, you wanted to sing, and everyone was surprised by the beauty of the voice. This recording was left in the song
You noticed that the text was out of sync and broke the rhythm, so you spent a day changing it.
During the recording, you wanted to sing, but it was awful. You recorded again
You have understood that the autotune is something beautiful.
You slept all day, so you didn't do anything.
